title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\Overlay\AnimationFade
name: AnimationFade
description:
Display overlay object with fade animation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.Overlay.AnimationFade

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.xy
params.description: Normalized coordinates based on output video resolution. Valid values: 0.0–1.0. xy is the upper-left coordinate of the overlay object. For example, use the x and y coordinates {0,0} to position the top-left corner of the overlay animation in the top-left corner of the output video.

params.name: data.start_time_offset
params.description: The time to start the fade animation, in seconds. Default: 0

params.name: data.end_time_offset
params.description: The time to end the fade animation, in seconds. Default: start_time_offset + 1s

methods.name: getFadeType
methods.description:
Required. Type of fade animation: FADE_IN or FADE_OUT.
